metadata.title: CVE-2024-36288 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:SUNRPC: Fix loop termination condition in gss_free_in_token_pages()The in_token->pages[] array is not NULL terminated. This results inthe following KASAN splat:  KASAN: maybe wild-memory-access in range[0x04a2013400000008-0x04a201340000000f]

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
